// src/pages/Home.js import React from "react"; const destinations = [ { name: "Jaipur", image: "/images/jaipur.jpg" }, { name: "Goa", image: "/images/goa.jpg" }, { name: "Ladakh", image: "/images/ladakh.jpg" }, { name: "Munnar", image: "/images/munnar.jpg" }, { name: "Ooty", image: "/images/ooty.jpg" }, { name: "Kolkata", image: "/images/kolkata.jpg" }, { name: "", image: "/images/india1.jpg" }, ]; const Home = () => (

Welcome to Explore India

Explore the most beautiful places in India with us!

Book Now

Top Destinations

{destinations.map((place, idx) => (

{place.name}

Discover the magic of {place.name} with our travel packages.

))}
); export default Home;
